She showed me her room.
She sang a song, smiling at me.
ko: 걔는 나를 보며 웃으면서 노래를 불렀어.

en: She smiled at me while she sang a song.
ko: 걔는 노래를 부르면서 나를 보고 웃어줬어.

en: She asked me if I knew her address.
ko: 걔가 자기 주소 아냐고 나한테 물어봤어.

en: She sent me a long letter.
She beckoned me to come in.
She bowed deeply to me.
ko: 걔가 나한테 고개를 깊게 숙여 인사했어.

en: Whenever I meet her, she smiles at me.
ko: 걔는 만날 때마다 나를 보고 웃어줘.

en: She's good to me you know.
She showed me great kindness.
She walked side by side with me.
She and I are of an age.
She and I are the same age.
She thanked us for our help.
She walked slowly away from me.
She is from Hokkaido, but is now living in Tokyo.
ko: 걔 홋카이도 출신인데 지금은 도쿄에 살아.

en: She came here all the way from Hokkaido.
